column2: "Sɛ medze nyimpa nye abɔfo tɛkyerɛma mekasa
column4: mayɛ dɛ ayewa a ɔgyegye nye akasaa a ɔwosow."

column3: na minyim esumasɛm nyina nye nyimdzee nyina
column4: na sɛ mowɔ gyedzi nyina ma mututu mbepɔw mpo

column2: "Na sɛ medze m'ahodze nyina mema ehiafo
column3: na sɛ medze me nyimpadua ma dɛ wɔnhyew
column6: "#13.3 WƆNHYEW: Tsetse akyerɛw no bi ka dɛ: ama maahoahoa mo ho."

column3: ne yamu ye; ɔdɔ nnyɛ ahoɔyaw
mbom odzi nokwar no mu ehurusi;"

column2: "ɔsoa adze nyina; ɔgye adze nyina dzi; onya adze nyina ho enyidado
"Ɔdɔ mmbɔ adze da: na nkɔnhyɛnsɛm dze

column3: na yɛhyɛ nkɔm fa na fa:"

column2: "na sɛ dza odzi mu no nya ba a
column3: nna wobogu dza ɔyɛ fa na fa no."

column5: metsee adze ase dɛ abofra; na mebɛyɛɛ panyin yi

column2: "Na sesei dze yɛnam ahwehwɛ mu hu adze wɔ abɛbu mu
column3: na ndaamba dze yebohu enyim na enyim: sesei dze minyim fa na fa
column4: na ndaamba dze mubohu no dɛ mbrɛ woehu mo so."

column5: ebiasa yi na ɔwɔ hɔ daa; na hɔn mu kɛse nye ɔdɔ."
